<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157955</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3398</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Memory's Armageddon: the Brain Fights Back</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Armageddon Des Speichers: das Gehirn 
kämpft zurück</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Armageddon de la Mémoire : le cerveau 
bat en retraite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Armageddon Da Memória: o cérebro luta 
para trás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Armageddon Della Memoria: il cervello 
combatte indietro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Armageddon μνήμης: ο εγκέφαλος παλεύει πίσω</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Armageddon De la Memoria: el cerebro lucha 
detrás</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interesting illustrated explanation of brain research on Altzheimers disease and the research for development of an innotative treatment</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain disorder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">memory loss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amyloids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Altzheimers disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Interessieren veranschaulichte Erklärung der
Gehirnforschung auf Altzheimers Krankheit und der Forschung für 
Entwicklung einer innotative Behandlung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intéresser a illustré l'explication de la 
recherche de cerveau sur la maladie d'Altzheimers et de la recherche 
pour le développement d'un traitement innotative</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interessar ilustrou a explanação da pesquisa do
cérebro sobre a doença de Altzheimers e da pesquisa para o 
desenvolvimento de um tratamento innotative</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interessare ha illustrato la spiegazione di 
ricerca del cervello sulla malattia di Altzheimers e della ricerca per
sviluppo di un trattamento innotative</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ενδιαφέρει επεξήγησε την εξήγηση της έρευνας 
εγκεφάλου για την ασθένεια Altzheimers και της έρευνας για την 
ανάπτυξη μιας innotative θεραπείας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El interesar ilustró la explicación de la 
investigación del cerebro sobre la enfermedad de Altzheimers y de la 
investigación para el desarrollo de un tratamiento innotative</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirnstörung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Speicherverlust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amyloiden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Altzheimers Krankheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">désordre de cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perte de mémoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">amyloïdes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La maladie d'Altzheimers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cérebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">disorder do cérebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">amiloidi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Malattia di Altzheimers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκέφαλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απώλεια μνήμης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">amyloids</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
